# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(asynchronous LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(asynchronous "")
set_target_properties(asynchronous PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "asynchronous")
set_target_properties(asynchronous PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(asynchronous PRIVATE
    ../../include
)
target_compile_definitions(asynchronous PRIVATE
    _WIN32_WINNT=0x0A00
)
target_compile_options(asynchronous PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(asynchronous PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(asynchronous PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(asynchronous PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(asynchronous PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(asynchronous PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET asynchronous PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(asynchronous PRIVATE
    main.cpp
    ../../src/api.cpp
    ../../src/enums.cpp
    ../../src/errors.cpp
    ../../src/pairslist.cpp
    ../../src/reports.cpp
    ../../src/tools.cpp
    ../../src/types.cpp
    ../../src/websocket.cpp
    ../../include/binapi/dtf.cpp
)
